title: BMS 12S 100A (LiFePO4)
shortDescription: High-current Battery Management System designed for 12-series LiFePO4 battery packs with robust protection features.
fullDescription: The BMS 12S 100A is engineered for demanding applications requiring reliable power management in LiFePO4 battery systems. Featuring advanced protection circuitry and high-current handling capabilities, this BMS ensures optimal battery performance and longevity. Ideal for electric vehicles, energy storage systems, and industrial applications.

title: BMS 16S 150A (Li-ion)
shortDescription: Premium high-power Battery Management System for 16-series lithium-ion configurations with advanced monitoring capabilities.
fullDescription: Our flagship BMS 16S 150A delivers exceptional performance for high-voltage lithium-ion applications. With sophisticated cell balancing algorithms and comprehensive protection mechanisms, this BMS is perfect for commercial EVs, grid storage, and high-power industrial equipment. The advanced thermal management ensures safe operation under extreme conditions.

specifications.Protection Features: Over-charge, Over-discharge, Short-circuit, Over-temperature, Cell balancing

title: BMS 13S 80A (Li-ion)
shortDescription: Compact and efficient Battery Management System for 13-series lithium-ion battery packs with intelligent protection.
fullDescription: The BMS 13S 80A offers an excellent balance of performance and affordability for mid-range lithium-ion applications. Its compact design makes it ideal for space-constrained installations while maintaining full protection and monitoring capabilities. Popular in e-bikes, power tools, and portable power stations.
